summary: During the tumultuous 1943, against the backdrop of a German-occupied Thessaloniki, two star-crossed lovers struggle to surmount prejudice and fear, as the brutalities against the town's persecuted Jewish community escalate.
cast: Andreas Konstantinou|Haris Fragoulis|Hristina Heila-Fameli|Vasiliki Troufakou|Yannis Stankoglou|Gerasimos Skiadaressis|Alberto Eskenazy|Maria Kavoukidou|Mihalis Aerakis|Yannis Aivazis|Petros Xekoukis|Thodoros Antoniadis|Xanthi Georgiou|Stamatis Tzelepis|Regina Pantelidi|Nikos Ioannidis|Sotiris Antoniou|Betty Apostolou|Iris Baglanea|Abe Cohen|Dimitris Danampasis|Hristoforos Dikas|Giorgos Floratos|Adrian Frieling|Stella Giaboura|Vasilis Giakoumaros|Grigoris Giannopoulos|Hristos Glykos|Ada Gourbali|Giorgos Haleplis|Thomas Hatzis|Menelaos Hazarakis|Romanos Kalokyris|Thomas Kolovos|Lakis Komninos|Konstantina Maltezou|Frixos Manasakis|Christina Mantesi|Nikos Mavroudis|Sofia Mermiga|Dimitra Mesimerli|Dimitris Paleohoritis|Ioanna Paleopanou|Sasa Papalambrou|Gerasimos Pavlou|Angelos Poulis|Fanis Prassas|Argyris Sazaklis|Michael Seibel|Yiorgos Triantafyllou|Kyriakos Tzoulatis|Panos Zygouros
title: Ouzeri Tsitsanis
